customer_issue_description: Ping spikes and high latency observed while playing online games on mobile network.
root_cause: Backend network routing issue affecting specific websites.
final_resolution: Rerouted affected traffic at core network layer; requested customer to clear DNS cache and recheck.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports incorrect deduction for data pack renewal despite sufficient main balance.
root_cause: Incorrect rating configuration in billing system for certain usages.
final_resolution: Updated roaming tariff configuration and provided one-time goodwill credit for impacted charges.

customer_issue_description: International roaming pack purchased but not reflecting on the number.
root_cause: KYC documents pending verification at backend.
final_resolution: Enabled VoLTE provisioning on HLR/HSS and requested customer to toggle airplane mode.

customer_issue_description: Router lights show internet active, but no websites open on any connected device.
root_cause: Router placed in a corner leading to poor signal propagation.
final_resolution: Recommended Wi-Fi range extender for dead zones and scheduled technician visit for site survey.

customer_issue_description: Fiber broadband works but latency is very high during video calls and gaming.
root_cause: Physical fiber cut detected on access network segment.
final_resolution: Updated QoS profile for the subscriber and monitored speed tests post-change.

customer_issue_description: User is unable to make or receive calls while roaming internationally.
root_cause: International roaming barred at home network level.
final_resolution: Applied correct roaming pack retroactively and adjusted excessive roaming charges as goodwill.

customer_issue_description: Customer's KYC verification failed despite submitting correct documents at store.
root_cause: Store submitted incomplete or blurred document images.
final_resolution: Re-triggered KYC verification and scheduled callback to confirm status.

customer_issue_description: Customer recharged wrong plan by mistake and wants to change it.
root_cause: Recharge reversal flow not available for mistakenly selected plans.
final_resolution: Fixed plan mapping in IN system and refunded incorrect call charges.

customer_issue_description: Wallet recharge shows pending status for several hours.
root_cause: Payment gateway timeout caused status mismatch between bank and operator.
final_resolution: Re-enabled auto-pay after updating card details and removed late payment charges.

customer_issue_description: Value-added service pack shows active, but features are not working on the number.
root_cause: VAS subscription profile not synced to HLR for this MSISDN.
final_resolution: Refreshed CRBT profile and shared alternate activation methods with the customer.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports frequent call mute issues on specific handset model.

customer_issue_description: Customer unable to access certain websites; other sites work fine on mobile data.

final_resolution: Re-initiated eSIM activation profile and guided customer step-by-step through setup.

customer_issue_description: Data pack validity does not match what was shown in the app during recharge.
root_cause: Recharge benefits mapped to wrong plan code in system.
final_resolution: Raised special case request to change wrongly selected plan and provided goodwill data credit.

customer_issue_description: Customer's online payment failed, but amount has been debited from bank account.
root_cause: Auto-pay mandate expired or suspended by issuing bank.
final_resolution: Whitelisted customer's card in risk engine and advised retry; monitored transaction.

customer_issue_description: Caller tune activated automatically without customer's consent.
root_cause: Caller tune VAS configured for auto-activation on new SIMs.
final_resolution: Refreshed CRBT profile and shared alternate activation methods with the customer.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports frequent call mute issues on specific handset model.
root_cause: IMS settings misconfigured in device carrier profile.
final_resolution: Escalated codec compatibility issue to network engineering and suggested temporary workaround.

customer_issue_description: Customer suspects SIM swap fraud after losing network suddenly for several hours.
root_cause: Phishing campaign targeting users via SMS with fake links.
final_resolution: Registered spam complaint and blocked reported numbers at network level.

customer_issue_description: Customer unable to access certain websites; other sites work fine on mobile data.
root_cause: Planned maintenance activity in the customer's area.
final_resolution: Optimized network parameters for the affected cell and initiated capacity upgrade; informed customer about timeline.

customer_issue_description: Customer complains about unexpected roaming charges during a domestic trip.
root_cause: VAS pack auto-renewal enabled by default in the system.
final_resolution: Updated roaming tariff configuration and provided one-time goodwill credit for impacted charges.

customer_issue_description: Customer is unable to use VoLTE despite compatible handset and 4G SIM.
root_cause: International roaming service not provisioned on subscriber profile.
final_resolution: Activated international roaming pack on subscriber profile and sent confirmation SMS.

customer_issue_description: One or more devices at home cannot connect to the Wi-Fi network, showing authentication error.
root_cause: Incorrect Wi-Fi security settings leading to authentication failures.
final_resolution: Recommended Wi-Fi range extender for dead zones and scheduled technician visit for site survey.

customer_issue_description: Fiber broadband works but latency is very high during video calls and gaming.
root_cause: Physical fiber cut detected on access network segment.
final_resolution: Updated QoS profile for the subscriber and monitored speed tests post-change.

customer_issue_description: User is unable to make or receive calls while roaming internationally.
root_cause: International roaming barred at home network level.
final_resolution: Enabled data roaming at core network and requested customer to toggle data roaming in device settings.

customer_issue_description: Customer is unable to download eSIM profile on supported handset.
root_cause: KYC details not updated in central verification system.
final_resolution: Blocked existing SIM immediately and initiated replacement SIM process at nearest store.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports that OTT benefits of new plan are not showing in account.
root_cause: Recharge reversal flow not available for mistakenly selected plans.
final_resolution: Manually applied missing recharge benefits and shared updated balance details.

customer_issue_description: Wallet recharge shows pending status for several hours.
root_cause: Payment gateway timeout caused status mismatch between bank and operator.
final_resolution: Re-enabled auto-pay after updating card details and removed late payment charges.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports Hotstar/Netflix access not working despite eligible plan.
root_cause: Incorrect mapping of OTT benefit with current tariff plan.
final_resolution: Deactivated unwanted caller tune service and reversed recent charges.

customer_issue_description: Customer's 5G-compatible handset is not showing 5G network option in the settings.
root_cause: VoLTE not whitelisted for this handset model by operator.
final_resolution: Advised customer to reset network settings and monitored call stability post-reset.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports receiving multiple spam calls claiming to be from telecom support.
root_cause: Fraudster initiated SIM swap using stolen KYC details.
final_resolution: Immediately blocked SIM and initiated fresh SIM issuance after enhanced verification.

customer_issue_description: Frequent call drops and poor voice quality in the basement parking area.
root_cause: Coverage hole due to distance from nearest tower and indoor penetration loss.
final_resolution: Rerouted affected traffic at core network layer; requested customer to clear DNS cache and recheck.

customer_issue_description: User has been charged twice for the same postpaid bill payment.

final_resolution: Updated roaming tariff configuration and provided one-time goodwill credit for impacted charges.

final_resolution: Completed KYC verification and triggered SIM activation; informed customer of expected activation time.

customer_issue_description: One or more devices at home cannot connect to the Wi-Fi network, showing authentication error.
root_cause: Router placed in a corner leading to poor signal propagation.
final_resolution: Recommended Wi-Fi range extender for dead zones and scheduled technician visit for site survey.

customer_issue_description: LOS light blinking red on ONT; customer has no internet access.
root_cause: Traffic congestion on upstream backhaul link during peak hours.
final_resolution: Rerouted traffic to less congested backhaul path during peak hours; advised customer to retest.

customer_issue_description: User is unable to make or receive calls while roaming internationally.
root_cause: Data roaming disabled on subscriber's profile in HLR.
final_resolution: Applied correct roaming pack retroactively and adjusted excessive roaming charges as goodwill.

customer_issue_description: New SIM card is not working; network shows emergency calls only after activation attempt.
root_cause: eSIM activation profile download failed due to provisioning error.
final_resolution: Blocked existing SIM immediately and initiated replacement SIM process at nearest store.

customer_issue_description: Data pack validity does not match what was shown in the app during recharge.
root_cause: Recharge benefits mapped to wrong plan code in system.
final_resolution: Corrected validity configuration and extended pack expiry as per original offer.

customer_issue_description: Wallet recharge shows pending status for several hours.
root_cause: UPI PSP experiencing intermittent issues impacting transactions.
final_resolution: Coordinated with UPI provider to confirm status and credited amount as advance payment.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports Hotstar/Netflix access not working despite eligible plan.
root_cause: Caller tune VAS configured for auto-activation on new SIMs.
final_resolution: Re-sent Amazon Prime activation link and verified successful partner registration.

customer_issue_description: IMS registration status shows 'Not registered' on customer's phone.
root_cause: IMS settings misconfigured in device carrier profile.
final_resolution: Updated IMS configuration via carrier settings push and asked customer to reboot device.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports phishing SMS asking for bank and OTP details related to mobile account.
root_cause: Account credentials compromised due to reuse on third-party apps.
final_resolution: Registered spam complaint and blocked reported numbers at network level.

customer_issue_description: User experiencing very slow internet speed while browsing and streaming on 4G/5G.
root_cause: Backend network routing issue affecting specific websites.
final_resolution: Optimized network parameters for the affected cell and initiated capacity upgrade; informed customer about timeline.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports incorrect deduction for data pack renewal despite sufficient main balance.
root_cause: VAS pack auto-renewal enabled by default in the system.
final_resolution: Corrected pro-rated charges and regenerated the latest bill; explained breakup to customer.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports that new SIM is not getting activated even after one week of insertion.
root_cause: VoLTE provisioning not enabled on HLR/HSS for the number.
final_resolution: Enabled VoLTE provisioning on HLR/HSS and requested customer to toggle airplane mode.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports weak Wi-Fi signal in some rooms, causing buffering while streaming.
root_cause: PPPoE session not established due to wrong credentials in router.
final_resolution: Reset Wi-Fi security mode and updated password; guided customer to reconnect devices.

customer_issue_description: Fiber broadband works but latency is very high during video calls and gaming.
root_cause: Incorrect QoS configuration on access router for this subscriber.
final_resolution: Updated QoS profile for the subscriber and monitored speed tests post-change.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports extremely high roaming bill after short international trip.
root_cause: No roaming agreement with visited network in that region.
final_resolution: Removed international roaming bar and sent confirmation; asked customer to reboot device.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports SIM lost and wants to block the existing SIM immediately.
root_cause: eSIM activation profile download failed due to provisioning error.

final_resolution: Immediately blocked SIM and initiated fresh SIM issuance after enhanced verification.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports no network coverage inside their apartment for the last three days.
root_cause: Planned maintenance activity in the customer's area.
final_resolution: Optimized network parameters for the affected cell and initiated capacity upgrade; informed customer about timeline.

customer_issue_description: User has been charged twice for the same postpaid bill payment.
root_cause: Incorrect rating configuration in billing system for certain usages.
final_resolution: Updated roaming tariff configuration and provided one-time goodwill credit for impacted charges.

customer_issue_description: Customer is unable to use VoLTE despite compatible handset and 4G SIM.

customer_issue_description: One or more devices at home cannot connect to the Wi-Fi network, showing authentication error.
root_cause: Wi-Fi channel interference from neighboring networks.
final_resolution: Reset Wi-Fi security mode and updated password; guided customer to reconnect devices.

customer_issue_description: Frequent disconnections on FTTH connection, especially during night.
root_cause: Traffic congestion on upstream backhaul link during peak hours.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports extremely high roaming bill after short international trip.
root_cause: Delay in roaming profile update after arrival in visited country.
final_resolution: Enabled data roaming at core network and requested customer to toggle data roaming in device settings.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports SIM lost and wants to block the existing SIM immediately.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports that OTT benefits of new plan are not showing in account.

final_resolution: Removed international roaming bar and sent confirmation; asked customer to reboot device.

customer_issue_description: New SIM card is not working; network shows emergency calls only after activation attempt.
root_cause: Store submitted incomplete or blurred document images.
final_resolution: Re-triggered KYC verification and scheduled callback to confirm status.

customer_issue_description: Customer's recent recharge amount was deducted but benefits not credited.
root_cause: Recharge reversal flow not available for mistakenly selected plans.
final_resolution: Corrected validity configuration and extended pack expiry as per original offer.

customer_issue_description: Customer's card is being declined on the telecom app, but works on other apps.
root_cause: Wallet platform callback not received by telecom billing system.
final_resolution: Checked payment gateway logs and initiated refund for the failed transaction.

customer_issue_description: Bundled Amazon Prime subscription is not getting activated with current plan.
root_cause: CRBT provisioning request not reaching VAS platform.
final_resolution: Refreshed CRBT profile and shared alternate activation methods with the customer.

customer_issue_description: Customer's 5G-compatible handset is not showing 5G network option in the settings.
root_cause: Compatibility issue between handset software and network codec settings.
final_resolution: Shared handset software update details and recommended upgrading to latest firmware.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports receiving multiple spam calls claiming to be from telecom support.
root_cause: Phishing campaign targeting users via SMS with fake links.
final_resolution: Immediately blocked SIM and initiated fresh SIM issuance after enhanced verification.

customer_issue_description: Customer unable to access certain websites; other sites work fine on mobile data.
root_cause: Incorrect APN configuration on the customer's device.
final_resolution: Optimized network parameters for the affected cell and initiated capacity upgrade; informed customer about timeline.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports higher than expected bill amount for the last billing cycle.
root_cause: Pro-rated charges miscalculated after mid-cycle plan change.
final_resolution: Deactivated unwanted VAS, reversed recent deductions, and activated DND for promotional calls.

customer_issue_description: Customer is unable to use VoLTE despite compatible handset and 4G SIM.
root_cause: Plan migration request stuck in intermediate state in CRM system.
final_resolution: Activated international roaming pack on subscriber profile and sent confirmation SMS.

customer_issue_description: Router lights show internet active, but no websites open on any connected device.

final_resolution: Recommended Wi-Fi range extender for dead zones and scheduled technician visit for site survey.

customer_issue_description: LOS light blinking red on ONT; customer has no internet access.
root_cause: Traffic congestion on upstream backhaul link during peak hours.
final_resolution: Rerouted traffic to less congested backhaul path during peak hours; advised customer to retest.

customer_issue_description: Incoming SMS, including OTPs, not received while roaming outside home circle.
root_cause: Incorrect roaming tariff mapping for the subscriber's plan.
final_resolution: Shared list of supported networks in visited country and guided customer to select network manually.

final_resolution: Rerouted traffic to less congested backhaul path during peak hours; advised customer to retest.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports extremely high roaming bill after short international trip.
root_cause: No roaming agreement with visited network in that region.
final_resolution: Refreshed roaming profile on HLR and tested incoming SMS delivery with sample OTP.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports unauthorized SIM swap request received via SMS.
root_cause: eSIM activation profile download failed due to provisioning error.
final_resolution: Blocked existing SIM immediately and initiated replacement SIM process at nearest store.

customer_issue_description: Unlimited calling plan activated, but calls are still charged from main balance.
root_cause: Recharge benefits mapped to wrong plan code in system.
final_resolution: Corrected validity configuration and extended pack expiry as per original offer.

customer_issue_description: Wallet recharge shows pending status for several hours.
root_cause: Payment gateway timeout caused status mismatch between bank and operator.
final_resolution: Manually updated wallet recharge status and informed customer of successful credit.

customer_issue_description: Customer unable to activate caller tune using USSD or app.
root_cause: OTT partner API not receiving activation callback from operator.
final_resolution: Deactivated unwanted caller tune service and reversed recent charges.

customer_issue_description: Customer facing one-way voice issues only on a particular smartphone brand.
root_cause: Compatibility issue between handset software and network codec settings.
final_resolution: Shared handset software update details and recommended upgrading to latest firmware.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports phishing SMS asking for bank and OTP details related to mobile account.
root_cause: Spam calls originating from known fraudulent number ranges.
final_resolution: Educated customer on securing Wi-Fi/hotspot and reset account passwords.

customer_issue_description: User experiencing very slow internet speed while browsing and streaming on 4G/5G.
root_cause: Backend network routing issue affecting specific websites.
final_resolution: Guided customer to reset APN to default settings and restart device; confirmed browsing restored.

customer_issue_description: Customer complains about unexpected roaming charges during a domestic trip.
root_cause: Old roaming tariff configuration applied to new plan.
final_resolution: Updated roaming tariff configuration and provided one-time goodwill credit for impacted charges.

customer_issue_description: User cannot make outgoing calls; message says 'outgoing calls barred'.
root_cause: Plan migration request stuck in intermediate state in CRM system.
final_resolution: Manually completed stuck plan migration and resent plan benefit details to customer.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports weak Wi-Fi signal in some rooms, causing buffering while streaming.
root_cause: Incorrect Wi-Fi security settings leading to authentication failures.
final_resolution: Recommended Wi-Fi range extender for dead zones and scheduled technician visit for site survey.

customer_issue_description: Customer experiencing very low download speed compared to subscribed fiber plan.
root_cause: Traffic congestion on upstream backhaul link during peak hours.
final_resolution: Dispatched field engineer to repair fiber cut and restored service; confirmed connectivity with customer.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports extremely high roaming bill after short international trip.
root_cause: Incorrect roaming tariff mapping for the subscriber's plan.
final_resolution: Removed international roaming bar and sent confirmation; asked customer to reboot device.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports SIM lost and wants to block the existing SIM immediately.
root_cause: Suspicious SIM swap attempt detected by fraud management system.
final_resolution: Re-triggered KYC verification and scheduled callback to confirm status.

customer_issue_description: Customer recharged wrong plan by mistake and wants to change it.
root_cause: Recharge reversal flow not available for mistakenly selected plans.
final_resolution: Manually applied missing recharge benefits and shared updated balance details.

customer_issue_description: Customer unable to pay bill using UPI; transaction repeatedly times out.

customer_issue_description: Caller tune activated automatically without customer's consent.

final_resolution: Upgraded router firmware remotely and requested customer to reboot the device.

customer_issue_description: Customer experiencing very low download speed compared to subscribed fiber plan.
root_cause: ONT not registered correctly with OLT after recent maintenance.
final_resolution: Replaced damaged fiber drop cable and optimized connector terminations at ONT.

customer_issue_description: Incoming SMS, including OTPs, not received while roaming outside home circle.
root_cause: No roaming agreement with visited network in that region.
final_resolution: Applied correct roaming pack retroactively and adjusted excessive roaming charges as goodwill.

customer_issue_description: Customer is unable to download eSIM profile on supported handset.
root_cause: eSIM activation profile download failed due to provisioning error.
final_resolution: Re-initiated eSIM activation profile and guided customer step-by-step through setup.

customer_issue_description: Data pack validity does not match what was shown in the app during recharge.
root_cause: Recharge reversal flow not available for mistakenly selected plans.
final_resolution: Activated pending OTT benefits and shared login/activation instructions.

customer_issue_description: Wallet recharge shows pending status for several hours.
root_cause: UPI PSP experiencing intermittent issues impacting transactions.
final_resolution: Whitelisted customer's card in risk engine and advised retry; monitored transaction.

customer_issue_description: Customer unable to activate caller tune using USSD or app.
root_cause: OTT partner API not receiving activation callback from operator.
final_resolution: Re-provisioned VAS pack on HLR and validated service usability with test calls.

customer_issue_description: IMS registration status shows 'Not registered' on customer's phone.
root_cause: VoLTE not whitelisted for this handset model by operator.
final_resolution: Advised customer to reset network settings and monitored call stability post-reset.

customer_issue_description: Customer suspects SIM swap fraud after losing network suddenly for several hours.
root_cause: Customer Wi-Fi or hotspot left unsecured, allowing misuse.
final_resolution: Reported phishing URLs to security team and blocked associated sender IDs.

customer_issue_description: Frequent call drops and poor voice quality in the rural area area.
root_cause: Coverage hole due to distance from nearest tower and indoor penetration loss.
final_resolution: Provided temporary bill waiver for impacted days and notified customer about planned maintenance window.

customer_issue_description: Activation charges for a value-added service appear on the bill without consent.
root_cause: Duplicate payment entry due to payment gateway timeout.

final_resolution: Completed KYC verification and triggered SIM activation; informed customer of expected activation time.

customer_issue_description: Router lights show internet active, but no websites open on any connected device.
root_cause: Router placed in a corner leading to poor signal propagation.
final_resolution: Reset Wi-Fi security mode and updated password; guided customer to reconnect devices.

customer_issue_description: LOS light blinking red on ONT; customer has no internet access.
root_cause: Incorrect QoS configuration on access router for this subscriber.
final_resolution: Dispatched field engineer to repair fiber cut and restored service; confirmed connectivity with customer.

customer_issue_description: Data roaming not working even though data roaming is enabled in device settings.
root_cause: No roaming agreement with visited network in that region.
final_resolution: Applied correct roaming pack retroactively and adjusted excessive roaming charges as goodwill.

customer_issue_description: Customer is unable to download eSIM profile on supported handset.
root_cause: SIM block request not processed correctly in HLR.
final_resolution: Re-triggered KYC verification and scheduled callback to confirm status.

customer_issue_description: Customer recharged wrong plan by mistake and wants to change it.
root_cause: OTT entitlement flag not enabled during plan activation.
final_resolution: Manually applied missing recharge benefits and shared updated balance details.

customer_issue_description: Customer's card is being declined on the telecom app, but works on other apps.
root_cause: Card payment blocked by risk engine due to unusual pattern.
final_resolution: Checked payment gateway logs and initiated refund for the failed transaction.

customer_issue_description: Value-added service pack shows active, but features are not working on the number.
root_cause: OTT partner API not receiving activation callback from operator.
final_resolution: Re-provisioned VAS pack on HLR and validated service usability with test calls.

customer_issue_description: VoLTE toggle is missing or greyed out on customer's device.
root_cause: Device-specific audio driver bug causing call mute issue.
final_resolution: Updated IMS configuration via carrier settings push and asked customer to reboot device.

customer_issue_description: Customer's account shows unknown usage of high data during late night hours.
root_cause: Fraudster initiated SIM swap using stolen KYC details.
final_resolution: Reported phishing URLs to security team and blocked associated sender IDs.

customer_issue_description: Ping spikes and high latency observed while playing online games on mobile network.
root_cause: Backend network routing issue affecting specific websites.
final_resolution: Advised customer to enable VoLTE and 4G preferred mode; raised a coverage optimization request for their area.

customer_issue_description: User has been charged twice for the same postpaid bill payment.
root_cause: Duplicate payment entry due to payment gateway timeout.
final_resolution: Deactivated unwanted VAS, reversed recent deductions, and activated DND for promotional calls.

customer_issue_description: International roaming pack purchased but not reflecting on the number.
root_cause: Plan migration request stuck in intermediate state in CRM system.
final_resolution: Enabled VoLTE provisioning on HLR/HSS and requested customer to toggle airplane mode.

customer_issue_description: One or more devices at home cannot connect to the Wi-Fi network, showing authentication error.
root_cause: Router placed in a corner leading to poor signal propagation.
final_resolution: Recommended Wi-Fi range extender for dead zones and scheduled technician visit for site survey.

customer_issue_description: Frequent disconnections on FTTH connection, especially during morning peak hours.
root_cause: Physical fiber cut detected on access network segment.
final_resolution: Re-registered ONT with OLT and performed line tests to confirm stability.

customer_issue_description: Incoming SMS, including OTPs, not received while roaming outside home circle.
root_cause: Incorrect roaming tariff mapping for the subscriber's plan.
final_resolution: Enabled data roaming at core network and requested customer to toggle data roaming in device settings.

customer_issue_description: New SIM card is not working; network shows emergency calls only after activation attempt.
root_cause: SIM block request not processed correctly in HLR.
final_resolution: Re-initiated eSIM activation profile and guided customer step-by-step through setup.

customer_issue_description: Customer recharged wrong plan by mistake and wants to change it.
root_cause: Recharge reversal flow not available for mistakenly selected plans.
final_resolution: Fixed plan mapping in IN system and refunded incorrect call charges.

customer_issue_description: Customer's online payment failed, but amount has been debited from bank account.
root_cause: Payment gateway timeout caused status mismatch between bank and operator.
final_resolution: Coordinated with UPI provider to confirm status and credited amount as advance payment.

customer_issue_description: Caller tune activated automatically without customer's consent.
root_cause: Incorrect mapping of OTT benefit with current tariff plan.
final_resolution: Synced OTT benefits with partner platform and asked customer to log out and log in again.

customer_issue_description: Customer facing one-way voice issues only on a particular smartphone brand.
root_cause: Compatibility issue between handset software and network codec settings.
final_resolution: Updated IMS configuration via carrier settings push and asked customer to reboot device.

customer_issue_description: Customer received message about change in email/alternate number without requesting it.
root_cause: Fraudster initiated SIM swap using stolen KYC details.
final_resolution: Immediately blocked SIM and initiated fresh SIM issuance after enhanced verification.

customer_issue_description: Ping spikes and high latency observed while playing online games on mobile network.
root_cause: Coverage hole due to distance from nearest tower and indoor penetration loss.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports incorrect deduction for data pack renewal despite sufficient main balance.

final_resolution: Registered spam complaint and blocked reported numbers at network level.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports no network coverage inside their basement parking for the last three days.
root_cause: Temporary congestion at the serving cell tower.
final_resolution: Guided customer to reset APN to default settings and restart device; confirmed browsing restored.

customer_issue_description: User has been charged twice for the same postpaid bill payment.
root_cause: Incorrect rating configuration in billing system for certain usages.
final_resolution: Raised adjustment request and reversed the excess billed amount; informed customer via SMS and email.

customer_issue_description: User cannot make outgoing calls; message says 'outgoing calls barred'.
root_cause: VoLTE provisioning not enabled on HLR/HSS for the number.
final_resolution: Enabled VoLTE provisioning on HLR/HSS and requested customer to toggle airplane mode.

customer_issue_description: Router lights show internet active, but no websites open on any connected device.
root_cause: Router placed in a corner leading to poor signal propagation.
final_resolution: Recommended Wi-Fi range extender for dead zones and scheduled technician visit for site survey.

customer_issue_description: LOS light blinking red on ONT; customer has no internet access.
root_cause: Traffic congestion on upstream backhaul link during peak hours.
final_resolution: Dispatched field engineer to repair fiber cut and restored service; confirmed connectivity with customer.

customer_issue_description: User is unable to make or receive calls while roaming internationally.
root_cause: Data roaming disabled on subscriber's profile in HLR.
final_resolution: Shared list of supported networks in visited country and guided customer to select network manually.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports SIM lost and wants to block the existing SIM immediately.
root_cause: SIM block request not processed correctly in HLR.
final_resolution: Blocked existing SIM immediately and initiated replacement SIM process at nearest store.

customer_issue_description: Customer recharged wrong plan by mistake and wants to change it.
root_cause: Sync delay between payment gateway and recharge platform.
final_resolution: Activated pending OTT benefits and shared login/activation instructions.

customer_issue_description: Auto-pay did not trigger this month, leading to service suspension.
root_cause: UPI PSP experiencing intermittent issues impacting transactions.
final_resolution: Coordinated with UPI provider to confirm status and credited amount as advance payment.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports Hotstar/Netflix access not working despite eligible plan.
root_cause: OTT partner API not receiving activation callback from operator.
final_resolution: Re-provisioned VAS pack on HLR and validated service usability with test calls.

customer_issue_description: VoLTE toggle is missing or greyed out on customer's device.
root_cause: VoLTE not whitelisted for this handset model by operator.
final_resolution: Escalated codec compatibility issue to network engineering and suggested temporary workaround.

customer_issue_description: Customer suspects SIM swap fraud after losing network suddenly for several hours.
root_cause: Fraudster initiated SIM swap using stolen KYC details.
final_resolution: Registered spam complaint and blocked reported numbers at network level.

customer_issue_description: Customer unable to access certain websites; other sites work fine on mobile data.
root_cause: Backend network routing issue affecting specific websites.
final_resolution: Guided customer to reset APN to default settings and restart device; confirmed browsing restored.

customer_issue_description: Activation charges for a value-added service appear on the bill without consent.
root_cause: Pro-rated charges miscalculated after mid-cycle plan change.
final_resolution: Raised adjustment request and reversed the excess billed amount; informed customer via SMS and email.

customer_issue_description: Customer is unable to use VoLTE despite compatible handset and 4G SIM.
root_cause: VoLTE provisioning not enabled on HLR/HSS for the number.
final_resolution: Manually completed stuck plan migration and resent plan benefit details to customer.

customer_issue_description: Wi-Fi speed over wireless is much lower than the speed over LAN cable on the same router.
root_cause: PPPoE session not established due to wrong credentials in router.
final_resolution: Changed Wi-Fi channel to a less congested one and advised optimal router placement.

customer_issue_description: Customer experiencing very low download speed compared to subscribed fiber plan.
root_cause: Traffic congestion on upstream backhaul link during peak hours.
final_resolution: Re-registered ONT with OLT and performed line tests to confirm stability.

customer_issue_description: Customer cannot latch onto any network after arriving in neighboring state.
root_cause: Delay in roaming profile update after arrival in visited country.

final_resolution: Shared list of supported networks in visited country and guided customer to select network manually.

customer_issue_description: Customer is unable to download eSIM profile on supported handset.
root_cause: KYC details not updated in central verification system.
final_resolution: Re-initiated eSIM activation profile and guided customer step-by-step through setup.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports that OTT benefits of new plan are not showing in account.
root_cause: Recharge benefits mapped to wrong plan code in system.
final_resolution: Corrected validity configuration and extended pack expiry as per original offer.

customer_issue_description: Customer's card is being declined on the telecom app, but works on other apps.
root_cause: Card payment blocked by risk engine due to unusual pattern.
final_resolution: Manually updated wallet recharge status and informed customer of successful credit.

customer_issue_description: Value-added service pack shows active, but features are not working on the number.
root_cause: Caller tune VAS configured for auto-activation on new SIMs.
final_resolution: Deactivated unwanted caller tune service and reversed recent charges.

customer_issue_description: VoLTE toggle is missing or greyed out on customer's device.
root_cause: VoLTE not whitelisted for this handset model by operator.
final_resolution: Shared handset software update details and recommended upgrading to latest firmware.

customer_issue_description: Customer received message about change in email/alternate number without requesting it.
root_cause: Customer Wi-Fi or hotspot left unsecured, allowing misuse.
final_resolution: Reported phishing URLs to security team and blocked associated sender IDs.

customer_issue_description: User experiencing very slow internet speed while browsing and streaming on 4G/5G.
root_cause: Coverage hole due to distance from nearest tower and indoor penetration loss.
final_resolution: Rerouted affected traffic at core network layer; requested customer to clear DNS cache and recheck.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports incorrect deduction for data pack renewal despite sufficient main balance.
root_cause: Pro-rated charges miscalculated after mid-cycle plan change.
final_resolution: Raised adjustment request and reversed the excess billed amount; informed customer via SMS and email.

customer_issue_description: User cannot make outgoing calls; message says 'outgoing calls barred'.
root_cause: Outgoing barring flag set due to previous unpaid dues.
final_resolution: Enabled VoLTE provisioning on HLR/HSS and requested customer to toggle airplane mode.

customer_issue_description: Router lights show internet active, but no websites open on any connected device.
root_cause: Wi-Fi channel interference from neighboring networks.
final_resolution: Reset Wi-Fi security mode and updated password; guided customer to reconnect devices.

customer_issue_description: Customer experiencing very low download speed compared to subscribed fiber plan.
root_cause: Physical fiber cut detected on access network segment.
final_resolution: Re-registered ONT with OLT and performed line tests to confirm stability.

customer_issue_description: Data roaming not working even though data roaming is enabled in device settings.
root_cause: Delay in roaming profile update after arrival in visited country.
final_resolution: Shared list of supported networks in visited country and guided customer to select network manually.

customer_issue_description: Customer is unable to download eSIM profile on supported handset.
root_cause: KYC details not updated in central verification system.
final_resolution: Re-triggered KYC verification and scheduled callback to confirm status.

customer_issue_description: Customer recharged wrong plan by mistake and wants to change it.
root_cause: Recharge benefits mapped to wrong plan code in system.
final_resolution: Corrected validity configuration and extended pack expiry as per original offer.

customer_issue_description: Auto-pay did not trigger this month, leading to service suspension.
root_cause: Auto-pay mandate expired or suspended by issuing bank.
final_resolution: Coordinated with UPI provider to confirm status and credited amount as advance payment.

customer_issue_description: Customer unable to activate caller tune using USSD or app.

customer_issue_description: Customer facing one-way voice issues only on a particular smartphone brand.

final_resolution: Educated customer on securing Wi-Fi/hotspot and reset account passwords.

customer_issue_description: Customer unable to access certain websites; other sites work fine on mobile data.

final_resolution: Recommended Wi-Fi range extender for dead zones and scheduled technician visit for site survey.

customer_issue_description: Customer experiencing very low download speed compared to subscribed fiber plan.
root_cause: ONT not registered correctly with OLT after recent maintenance.
final_resolution: Re-registered ONT with OLT and performed line tests to confirm stability.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports extremely high roaming bill after short international trip.
root_cause: International roaming barred at home network level.
final_resolution: Refreshed roaming profile on HLR and tested incoming SMS delivery with sample OTP.

customer_issue_description: New SIM card is not working; network shows emergency calls only after activation attempt.
root_cause: SIM block request not processed correctly in HLR.
final_resolution: Blocked existing SIM immediately and initiated replacement SIM process at nearest store.

customer_issue_description: Customer's recent recharge amount was deducted but benefits not credited.
root_cause: Incorrect plan configuration in prepaid IN system.
final_resolution: Corrected validity configuration and extended pack expiry as per original offer.

customer_issue_description: Customer's card is being declined on the telecom app, but works on other apps.
root_cause: Payment gateway timeout caused status mismatch between bank and operator.
final_resolution: Coordinated with UPI provider to confirm status and credited amount as advance payment.

customer_issue_description: Caller tune activated automatically without customer's consent.
root_cause: Incorrect mapping of OTT benefit with current tariff plan.
final_resolution: Refreshed CRBT profile and shared alternate activation methods with the customer.

customer_issue_description: Customer facing one-way voice issues only on a particular smartphone brand.
root_cause: VoLTE not whitelisted for this handset model by operator.
final_resolution: Advised customer to reset network settings and monitored call stability post-reset.

customer_issue_description: Customer suspects SIM swap fraud after losing network suddenly for several hours.
root_cause: Customer Wi-Fi or hotspot left unsecured, allowing misuse.
final_resolution: Reported phishing URLs to security team and blocked associated sender IDs.

customer_issue_description: User experiencing very slow internet speed while browsing and streaming on 4G/5G.
root_cause: Coverage hole due to distance from nearest tower and indoor penetration loss.
final_resolution: Optimized network parameters for the affected cell and initiated capacity upgrade; informed customer about timeline.

customer_issue_description: Customer complains about unexpected roaming charges during a domestic trip.
root_cause: Incorrect rating configuration in billing system for certain usages.
final_resolution: Corrected pro-rated charges and regenerated the latest bill; explained breakup to customer.

customer_issue_description: User cannot make outgoing calls; message says 'outgoing calls barred'.

final_resolution: Cleared outstanding barring flag after payment confirmation and refreshed services on the number.

customer_issue_description: Customer's home Wi-Fi router frequently disconnects and reconnects on its own.
root_cause: Router placed in a corner leading to poor signal propagation.
final_resolution: Recommended Wi-Fi range extender for dead zones and scheduled technician visit for site survey.

customer_issue_description: Frequent disconnections on FTTH connection, especially during late afternoon.
root_cause: Physical fiber cut detected on access network segment.
final_resolution: Rerouted traffic to less congested backhaul path during peak hours; advised customer to retest.

customer_issue_description: User is unable to make or receive calls while roaming internationally.
root_cause: Incorrect roaming tariff mapping for the subscriber's plan.
final_resolution: Enabled data roaming at core network and requested customer to toggle data roaming in device settings.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports unauthorized SIM swap request received via SMS.
root_cause: SIM block request not processed correctly in HLR.
final_resolution: Re-triggered KYC verification and scheduled callback to confirm status.

customer_issue_description: Unlimited calling plan activated, but calls are still charged from main balance.
root_cause: OTT entitlement flag not enabled during plan activation.
final_resolution: Corrected validity configuration and extended pack expiry as per original offer.

customer_issue_description: Customer unable to pay bill using UPI; transaction repeatedly times out.
root_cause: Auto-pay mandate expired or suspended by issuing bank.
final_resolution: Checked payment gateway logs and initiated refund for the failed transaction.

customer_issue_description: Caller tune activated automatically without customer's consent.
root_cause: OTT partner API not receiving activation callback from operator.
final_resolution: Re-sent Amazon Prime activation link and verified successful partner registration.

customer_issue_description: Customer's 5G-compatible handset is not showing 5G network option in the settings.
root_cause: Compatibility issue between handset software and network codec settings.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports phishing SMS asking for bank and OTP details related to mobile account.
root_cause: Fraudster initiated SIM swap using stolen KYC details.
final_resolution: Reverted unauthorized profile changes and enabled account lock with additional authentication.

customer_issue_description: Frequent call drops and poor voice quality in the shopping mall area.
root_cause: Incorrect APN configuration on the customer's device.
final_resolution: Advised customer to enable VoLTE and 4G preferred mode; raised a coverage optimization request for their area.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports higher than expected bill amount for the last billing cycle.

final_resolution: Raised adjustment request and reversed the excess billed amount; informed customer via SMS and email.

customer_issue_description: Customer is unable to use VoLTE despite compatible handset and 4G SIM.

customer_issue_description: Wi-Fi speed over wireless is much lower than the speed over LAN cable on the same router.

final_resolution: Changed Wi-Fi channel to a less congested one and advised optimal router placement.

final_resolution: Manually completed stuck plan migration and resent plan benefit details to customer.

customer_issue_description: Router lights show internet active, but no websites open on any connected device.
root_cause: Outdated router firmware causing instability.
final_resolution: Recommended Wi-Fi range extender for dead zones and scheduled technician visit for site survey.

customer_issue_description: Customer experiencing very low download speed compared to subscribed fiber plan.
root_cause: High optical signal loss due to damaged fiber drop cable.
final_resolution: Re-registered ONT with OLT and performed line tests to confirm stability.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports extremely high roaming bill after short international trip.
root_cause: No roaming agreement with visited network in that region.
final_resolution: Removed international roaming bar and sent confirmation; asked customer to reboot device.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports SIM lost and wants to block the existing SIM immediately.
root_cause: Store submitted incomplete or blurred document images.
final_resolution: Flagged suspicious SIM swap request and enabled additional verification on the account.

customer_issue_description: Customer recharged wrong plan by mistake and wants to change it.
root_cause: Recharge benefits mapped to wrong plan code in system.
final_resolution: Corrected validity configuration and extended pack expiry as per original offer.

customer_issue_description: Customer's card is being declined on the telecom app, but works on other apps.
root_cause: Auto-pay mandate expired or suspended by issuing bank.
final_resolution: Re-enabled auto-pay after updating card details and removed late payment charges.

customer_issue_description: Customer unable to activate caller tune using USSD or app.
root_cause: VAS subscription profile not synced to HLR for this MSISDN.
final_resolution: Synced OTT benefits with partner platform and asked customer to log out and log in again.

customer_issue_description: IMS registration status shows 'Not registered' on customer's phone.
root_cause: VoLTE not whitelisted for this handset model by operator.
final_resolution: Shared handset software update details and recommended upgrading to latest firmware.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports receiving multiple spam calls claiming to be from telecom support.
root_cause: Phishing campaign targeting users via SMS with fake links.
final_resolution: Immediately blocked SIM and initiated fresh SIM issuance after enhanced verification.

customer_issue_description: Ping spikes and high latency observed while playing online games on mobile network.
root_cause: Temporary congestion at the serving cell tower.
final_resolution: Advised customer to enable VoLTE and 4G preferred mode; raised a coverage optimization request for their area.

customer_issue_description: Activation charges for a value-added service appear on the bill without consent.
root_cause: Duplicate payment entry due to payment gateway timeout.
final_resolution: Deactivated unwanted VAS, reversed recent deductions, and activated DND for promotional calls.

customer_issue_description: International roaming pack purchased but not reflecting on the number.
root_cause: VoLTE provisioning not enabled on HLR/HSS for the number.
final_resolution: Manually completed stuck plan migration and resent plan benefit details to customer.

customer_issue_description: One or more devices at home cannot connect to the Wi-Fi network, showing authentication error.
root_cause: Wi-Fi channel interference from neighboring networks.
final_resolution: Reset Wi-Fi security mode and updated password; guided customer to reconnect devices.

customer_issue_description: Frequent disconnections on FTTH connection, especially during morning peak hours.
root_cause: Incorrect QoS configuration on access router for this subscriber.
final_resolution: Re-registered ONT with OLT and performed line tests to confirm stability.

customer_issue_description: Data roaming not working even though data roaming is enabled in device settings.
root_cause: Delay in roaming profile update after arrival in visited country.
final_resolution: Applied correct roaming pack retroactively and adjusted excessive roaming charges as goodwill.

customer_issue_description: Customer's KYC verification failed despite submitting correct documents at store.
root_cause: KYC details not updated in central verification system.
final_resolution: Blocked existing SIM immediately and initiated replacement SIM process at nearest store.

customer_issue_description: Unlimited calling plan activated, but calls are still charged from main balance.
root_cause: Sync delay between payment gateway and recharge platform.
final_resolution: Activated pending OTT benefits and shared login/activation instructions.

customer_issue_description: Customer's card is being declined on the telecom app, but works on other apps.
root_cause: UPI PSP experiencing intermittent issues impacting transactions.
final_resolution: Re-enabled auto-pay after updating card details and removed late payment charges.

customer_issue_description: Value-added service pack shows active, but features are not working on the number.
root_cause: Caller tune VAS configured for auto-activation on new SIMs.
final_resolution: Refreshed CRBT profile and shared alternate activation methods with the customer.

customer_issue_description: Customer facing one-way voice issues only on a particular smartphone brand.
root_cause: VoLTE not whitelisted for this handset model by operator.
final_resolution: Coordinated with device OEM team to whitelist model for VoLTE on our network.

customer_issue_description: Customer received message about change in email/alternate number without requesting it.
root_cause: Spam calls originating from known fraudulent number ranges.
final_resolution: Educated customer on securing Wi-Fi/hotspot and reset account passwords.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports no network coverage inside their office building for the last 24 hours.
root_cause: Incorrect APN configuration on the customer's device.
final_resolution: Guided customer to reset APN to default settings and restart device; confirmed browsing restored.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports higher than expected bill amount for the last billing cycle.
root_cause: Old roaming tariff configuration applied to new plan.
final_resolution: Raised adjustment request and reversed the excess billed amount; informed customer via SMS and email.

customer_issue_description: Customer requested plan migration but old plan benefits are still active.
root_cause: KYC documents pending verification at backend.
final_resolution: Activated international roaming pack on subscriber profile and sent confirmation SMS.

customer_issue_description: Customer's home Wi-Fi router frequently disconnects and reconnects on its own.
root_cause: Router placed in a corner leading to poor signal propagation.
final_resolution: Reconfigured PPPoE credentials in router and verified internet access on multiple devices.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports complete loss of connectivity on fiber broadband connection.
root_cause: Incorrect QoS configuration on access router for this subscriber.
final_resolution: Dispatched field engineer to repair fiber cut and restored service; confirmed connectivity with customer.

customer_issue_description: User is unable to make or receive calls while roaming internationally.
root_cause: International roaming barred at home network level.
final_resolution: Shared list of supported networks in visited country and guided customer to select network manually.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports unauthorized SIM swap request received via SMS.
root_cause: SIM block request not processed correctly in HLR.
final_resolution: Re-initiated eSIM activation profile and guided customer step-by-step through setup.

final_resolution: Processed refund for duplicate payment and shared reference ID with customer.

customer_issue_description: Customer is unable to use VoLTE despite compatible handset and 4G SIM.
root_cause: Plan migration request stuck in intermediate state in CRM system.
final_resolution: Manually completed stuck plan migration and resent plan benefit details to customer.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports weak Wi-Fi signal in some rooms, causing buffering while streaming.
root_cause: Wi-Fi channel interference from neighboring networks.
final_resolution: Upgraded router firmware remotely and requested customer to reboot the device.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports complete loss of connectivity on fiber broadband connection.
root_cause: High optical signal loss due to damaged fiber drop cable.
final_resolution: Replaced damaged fiber drop cable and optimized connector terminations at ONT.

customer_issue_description: Incoming SMS, including OTPs, not received while roaming outside home circle.
root_cause: International roaming barred at home network level.
final_resolution: Refreshed roaming profile on HLR and tested incoming SMS delivery with sample OTP.

customer_issue_description: Customer is unable to download eSIM profile on supported handset.
root_cause: Suspicious SIM swap attempt detected by fraud management system.
final_resolution: Requested customer to resubmit clear documents and escalated to KYC back-office team.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports that OTT benefits of new plan are not showing in account.
root_cause: Incorrect plan configuration in prepaid IN system.
final_resolution: Manually applied missing recharge benefits and shared updated balance details.

customer_issue_description: Customer unable to pay bill using UPI; transaction repeatedly times out.
root_cause: Wallet platform callback not received by telecom billing system.
final_resolution: Manually updated wallet recharge status and informed customer of successful credit.

customer_issue_description: Value-added service pack shows active, but features are not working on the number.
root_cause: VAS subscription profile not synced to HLR for this MSISDN.
final_resolution: Refreshed CRBT profile and shared alternate activation methods with the customer.

customer_issue_description: Customer's 5G-compatible handset is not showing 5G network option in the settings.
root_cause: Compatibility issue between handset software and network codec settings.
final_resolution: Updated IMS configuration via carrier settings push and asked customer to reboot device.

customer_issue_description: Customer suspects SIM swap fraud after losing network suddenly for several hours.
root_cause: Phishing campaign targeting users via SMS with fake links.
final_resolution: Educated customer on securing Wi-Fi/hotspot and reset account passwords.

customer_issue_description: User experiencing very slow internet speed while browsing and streaming on 4G/5G.
root_cause: Planned maintenance activity in the customer's area.
final_resolution: Provided temporary bill waiver for impacted days and notified customer about planned maintenance window.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports higher than expected bill amount for the last billing cycle.
root_cause: Duplicate payment entry due to payment gateway timeout.
final_resolution: Raised adjustment request and reversed the excess billed amount; informed customer via SMS and email.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports that new SIM is not getting activated even after one week of insertion.
root_cause: Plan migration request stuck in intermediate state in CRM system.
final_resolution: Activated international roaming pack on subscriber profile and sent confirmation SMS.

customer_issue_description: Router lights show internet active, but no websites open on any connected device.
root_cause: Wi-Fi channel interference from neighboring networks.
final_resolution: Changed Wi-Fi channel to a less congested one and advised optimal router placement.

customer_issue_description: Frequent disconnections on FTTH connection, especially during late afternoon.
root_cause: ONT not registered correctly with OLT after recent maintenance.
final_resolution: Updated QoS profile for the subscriber and monitored speed tests post-change.

customer_issue_description: User is unable to make or receive calls while roaming internationally.
root_cause: Data roaming disabled on subscriber's profile in HLR.

final_resolution: Processed refund for duplicate payment and shared reference ID with customer.

customer_issue_description: Customer requested plan migration but old plan benefits are still active.
root_cause: VoLTE provisioning not enabled on HLR/HSS for the number.
final_resolution: Cleared outstanding barring flag after payment confirmation and refreshed services on the number.

customer_issue_description: One or more devices at home cannot connect to the Wi-Fi network, showing authentication error.
root_cause: PPPoE session not established due to wrong credentials in router.
final_resolution: Reset Wi-Fi security mode and updated password; guided customer to reconnect devices.

customer_issue_description: Fiber broadband works but latency is very high during video calls and gaming.
root_cause: Traffic congestion on upstream backhaul link during peak hours.
final_resolution: Replaced damaged fiber drop cable and optimized connector terminations at ONT.

customer_issue_description: User is unable to make or receive calls while roaming internationally.
root_cause: Incorrect roaming tariff mapping for the subscriber's plan.
final_resolution: Shared list of supported networks in visited country and guided customer to select network manually.

customer_issue_description: New SIM card is not working; network shows emergency calls only after activation attempt.
root_cause: SIM block request not processed correctly in HLR.
final_resolution: Requested customer to resubmit clear documents and escalated to KYC back-office team.

customer_issue_description: Data pack validity does not match what was shown in the app during recharge.
root_cause: Recharge reversal flow not available for mistakenly selected plans.
final_resolution: Fixed plan mapping in IN system and refunded incorrect call charges.

customer_issue_description: Customer unable to pay bill using UPI; transaction repeatedly times out.
root_cause: UPI PSP experiencing intermittent issues impacting transactions.
final_resolution: Checked payment gateway logs and initiated refund for the failed transaction.

customer_issue_description: Bundled Amazon Prime subscription is not getting activated with current plan.
root_cause: VAS subscription profile not synced to HLR for this MSISDN.
final_resolution: Re-provisioned VAS pack on HLR and validated service usability with test calls.

customer_issue_description: Customer's 5G-compatible handset is not showing 5G network option in the settings.
root_cause: Device-specific audio driver bug causing call mute issue.
final_resolution: Updated IMS configuration via carrier settings push and asked customer to reboot device.

customer_issue_description: Customer suspects SIM swap fraud after losing network suddenly for several hours.
root_cause: Customer Wi-Fi or hotspot left unsecured, allowing misuse.
final_resolution: Educated customer on securing Wi-Fi/hotspot and reset account passwords.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports no network coverage inside their basement parking for the last 24 hours.
root_cause: Temporary congestion at the serving cell tower.
final_resolution: Rerouted affected traffic at core network layer; requested customer to clear DNS cache and recheck.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports incorrect deduction for data pack renewal despite sufficient main balance.
root_cause: Pro-rated charges miscalculated after mid-cycle plan change.
final_resolution: Processed refund for duplicate payment and shared reference ID with customer.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports that new SIM is not getting activated even after 24 hours of insertion.
root_cause: Plan migration request stuck in intermediate state in CRM system.
final_resolution: Manually completed stuck plan migration and resent plan benefit details to customer.

customer_issue_description: Wi-Fi speed over wireless is much lower than the speed over LAN cable on the same router.
root_cause: Router placed in a corner leading to poor signal propagation.
final_resolution: Reconfigured PPPoE credentials in router and verified internet access on multiple devices.

customer_issue_description: LOS light blinking red on ONT; customer has no internet access.
root_cause: Traffic congestion on upstream backhaul link during peak hours.
final_resolution: Dispatched field engineer to repair fiber cut and restored service; confirmed connectivity with customer.

root_cause: No roaming agreement with visited network in that region.
final_resolution: Enabled data roaming at core network and requested customer to toggle data roaming in device settings.

final_resolution: Blocked existing SIM immediately and initiated replacement SIM process at nearest store.

final_resolution: Guided customer to reset APN to default settings and restart device; confirmed browsing restored.

customer_issue_description: User has been charged twice for the same postpaid bill payment.
root_cause: Pro-rated charges miscalculated after mid-cycle plan change.
final_resolution: Processed refund for duplicate payment and shared reference ID with customer.

customer_issue_description: Customer is unable to use VoLTE despite compatible handset and 4G SIM.
root_cause: VoLTE provisioning not enabled on HLR/HSS for the number.
final_resolution: Manually completed stuck plan migration and resent plan benefit details to customer.

customer_issue_description: Router lights show internet active, but no websites open on any connected device.
root_cause: Wi-Fi channel interference from neighboring networks.
final_resolution: Changed Wi-Fi channel to a less congested one and advised optimal router placement.

customer_issue_description: Customer experiencing very low download speed compared to subscribed fiber plan.
root_cause: Incorrect QoS configuration on access router for this subscriber.
final_resolution: Rerouted traffic to less congested backhaul path during peak hours; advised customer to retest.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports extremely high roaming bill after short international trip.
root_cause: Incorrect roaming tariff mapping for the subscriber's plan.
final_resolution: Shared list of supported networks in visited country and guided customer to select network manually.

customer_issue_description: New SIM card is not working; network shows emergency calls only after activation attempt.
root_cause: Store submitted incomplete or blurred document images.
final_resolution: Re-initiated eSIM activation profile and guided customer step-by-step through setup.

customer_issue_description: Unlimited calling plan activated, but calls are still charged from main balance.
root_cause: Recharge benefits mapped to wrong plan code in system.
final_resolution: Fixed plan mapping in IN system and refunded incorrect call charges.

customer_issue_description: Auto-pay did not trigger this month, leading to service suspension.
root_cause: Auto-pay mandate expired or suspended by issuing bank.
final_resolution: Coordinated with UPI provider to confirm status and credited amount as advance payment.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports Hotstar/Netflix access not working despite eligible plan.
root_cause: Caller tune VAS configured for auto-activation on new SIMs.
final_resolution: Re-sent Amazon Prime activation link and verified successful partner registration.

customer_issue_description: Customer facing one-way voice issues only on a particular smartphone brand.
root_cause: Compatibility issue between handset software and network codec settings.
final_resolution: Advised customer to reset network settings and monitored call stability post-reset.

customer_issue_description: Customer suspects SIM swap fraud after losing network suddenly for several hours.
root_cause: Fraudster initiated SIM swap using stolen KYC details.
final_resolution: Registered spam complaint and blocked reported numbers at network level.

customer_issue_description: Customer unable to access certain websites; other sites work fine on mobile data.
root_cause: Coverage hole due to distance from nearest tower and indoor penetration loss.
final_resolution: Advised customer to enable VoLTE and 4G preferred mode; raised a coverage optimization request for their area.

customer_issue_description: User has been charged twice for the same postpaid bill payment.
root_cause: Pro-rated charges miscalculated after mid-cycle plan change.
final_resolution: Updated roaming tariff configuration and provided one-time goodwill credit for impacted charges.

customer_issue_description: LOS light blinking red on ONT; customer has no internet access.

final_resolution: Immediately blocked SIM and initiated fresh SIM issuance after enhanced verification.

customer_issue_description: Ping spikes and high latency observed while playing online games on mobile network.
root_cause: Planned maintenance activity in the customer's area.
final_resolution: Rerouted affected traffic at core network layer; requested customer to clear DNS cache and recheck.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports higher than expected bill amount for the last billing cycle.
root_cause: VAS pack auto-renewal enabled by default in the system.
final_resolution: Updated roaming tariff configuration and provided one-time goodwill credit for impacted charges.

customer_issue_description: International roaming pack purchased but not reflecting on the number.
root_cause: International roaming service not provisioned on subscriber profile.
final_resolution: Completed KYC verification and triggered SIM activation; informed customer of expected activation time.

customer_issue_description: Customer's home Wi-Fi router frequently disconnects and reconnects on its own.
root_cause: Outdated router firmware causing instability.
final_resolution: Reset Wi-Fi security mode and updated password; guided customer to reconnect devices.

customer_issue_description: Customer experiencing very low download speed compared to subscribed fiber plan.
root_cause: Incorrect QoS configuration on access router for this subscriber.
final_resolution: Dispatched field engineer to repair fiber cut and restored service; confirmed connectivity with customer.

customer_issue_description: Incoming SMS, including OTPs, not received while roaming outside home circle.
root_cause: International roaming barred at home network level.
final_resolution: Applied correct roaming pack retroactively and adjusted excessive roaming charges as goodwill.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports SIM lost and wants to block the existing SIM immediately.
root_cause: KYC details not updated in central verification system.
final_resolution: Re-triggered KYC verification and scheduled callback to confirm status.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports that OTT benefits of new plan are not showing in account.
root_cause: Recharge benefits mapped to wrong plan code in system.
final_resolution: Manually applied missing recharge benefits and shared updated balance details.

customer_issue_description: Customer's card is being declined on the telecom app, but works on other apps.
root_cause: Payment gateway timeout caused status mismatch between bank and operator.
final_resolution: Manually updated wallet recharge status and informed customer of successful credit.

customer_issue_description: Customer unable to activate caller tune using USSD or app.
root_cause: VAS subscription profile not synced to HLR for this MSISDN.
final_resolution: Re-provisioned VAS pack on HLR and validated service usability with test calls.

customer_issue_description: Customer's 5G-compatible handset is not showing 5G network option in the settings.
root_cause: IMS settings misconfigured in device carrier profile.
final_resolution: Shared handset software update details and recommended upgrading to latest firmware.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports receiving multiple spam calls claiming to be from telecom support.
root_cause: Customer Wi-Fi or hotspot left unsecured, allowing misuse.
final_resolution: Registered spam complaint and blocked reported numbers at network level.

customer_issue_description: Frequent call drops and poor voice quality in the rural area area.
root_cause: Temporary congestion at the serving cell tower.
final_resolution: Guided customer to reset APN to default settings and restart device; confirmed browsing restored.

customer_issue_description: Customer complains about unexpected roaming charges during a domestic trip.
root_cause: Pro-rated charges miscalculated after mid-cycle plan change.
final_resolution: Raised adjustment request and reversed the excess billed amount; informed customer via SMS and email.

customer_issue_description: User cannot make outgoing calls; message says 'outgoing calls barred'.
root_cause: Plan migration request stuck in intermediate state in CRM system.
final_resolution: Cleared outstanding barring flag after payment confirmation and refreshed services on the number.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports weak Wi-Fi signal in some rooms, causing buffering while streaming.
root_cause: Wi-Fi channel interference from neighboring networks.
final_resolution: Upgraded router firmware remotely and requested customer to reboot the device.

customer_issue_description: Customer experiencing very low download speed compared to subscribed fiber plan.
root_cause: ONT not registered correctly with OLT after recent maintenance.
final_resolution: Re-registered ONT with OLT and performed line tests to confirm stability.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports extremely high roaming bill after short international trip.
root_cause: International roaming barred at home network level.
final_resolution: Enabled data roaming at core network and requested customer to toggle data roaming in device settings.

customer_issue_description: New SIM card is not working; network shows emergency calls only after activation attempt.
root_cause: SIM block request not processed correctly in HLR.
final_resolution: Flagged suspicious SIM swap request and enabled additional verification on the account.

customer_issue_description: Unlimited calling plan activated, but calls are still charged from main balance.
root_cause: Recharge reversal flow not available for mistakenly selected plans.
final_resolution: Manually applied missing recharge benefits and shared updated balance details.

customer_issue_description: Customer unable to pay bill using UPI; transaction repeatedly times out.
root_cause: Auto-pay mandate expired or suspended by issuing bank.
final_resolution: Whitelisted customer's card in risk engine and advised retry; monitored transaction.

customer_issue_description: Caller tune activated automatically without customer's consent.
root_cause: Caller tune VAS configured for auto-activation on new SIMs.
final_resolution: Synced OTT benefits with partner platform and asked customer to log out and log in again.

customer_issue_description: IMS registration status shows 'Not registered' on customer's phone.
root_cause: Device-specific audio driver bug causing call mute issue.
final_resolution: Coordinated with device OEM team to whitelist model for VoLTE on our network.

customer_issue_description: Customer received message about change in email/alternate number without requesting it.
root_cause: Customer Wi-Fi or hotspot left unsecured, allowing misuse.
final_resolution: Educated customer on securing Wi-Fi/hotspot and reset account passwords.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports no network coverage inside their rural area for the last 24 hours.
root_cause: Coverage hole due to distance from nearest tower and indoor penetration loss.
final_resolution: Advised customer to enable VoLTE and 4G preferred mode; raised a coverage optimization request for their area.

customer_issue_description: User has been charged twice for the same postpaid bill payment.

final_resolution: Corrected pro-rated charges and regenerated the latest bill; explained breakup to customer.

customer_issue_description: Ping spikes and high latency observed while playing online games on mobile network.
root_cause: Coverage hole due to distance from nearest tower and indoor penetration loss.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports higher than expected bill amount for the last billing cycle.
root_cause: Duplicate payment entry due to payment gateway timeout.
final_resolution: Corrected pro-rated charges and regenerated the latest bill; explained breakup to customer.

customer_issue_description: User cannot make outgoing calls; message says 'outgoing calls barred'.

customer_issue_description: Customer reports weak Wi-Fi signal in some rooms, causing buffering while streaming.

customer_issue_description: Customer experiencing very low download speed compared to subscribed fiber plan.

final_resolution: Rerouted traffic to less congested backhaul path during peak hours; advised customer to retest.

customer_issue_description: User is unable to make or receive calls while roaming internationally.
